overview: All These Flowers is a documentary feature film effectively and emotionally defining Bipolar Disorder. This is a labor of love and a commitment to all those who have been labelled with a not-so-clearly-defined mental illness. The film is a witness of the life and struggle of those who have been diagnosed with the illness and it is the story of their triumph over the stigma, maltreatment, and the identity associated with it.
title: All These Flowers
